Context: To determine whether these changes are related to the state of biotin deficiency that develops in SMVT-cKO mice, we induced (by dietary means) biotin deficiency in wild-type mice and examined its effect on the abovementioned parameters.

Similar changes were observed in wild-type (WT) mice made biotin deficient via dietary manipulation but not in cultured intestinal epithelial Caco-2 monolayers maintained in vitro under a chronic biotin-deficient condition.
WT, wild-type; ZO, zonula occludens; MLCK, myosin light chain kinase.
